host.description: The host name of the MSSQL database.
host.title: Host

port.description: The port of the MSSQL database.
port.title: Port

database.description: The name of the MSSQL database.
database.title: DB Name

schema.description: The default schema tables are written to if the source does not specify a namespace. The usual value for this field is "public".
schema.title: Default Schema

user.description: The username which is used to access the database.
user.title: User

password.description: The password associated with this username.
password.title: Password

jdbc_url_params.description: Additional properties to pass to the JDBC URL string when connecting to the database formatted as 'key=value' pairs separated by the symbol '&'. (example: key1=value1&key2=value2&key3=value3).
jdbc_url_params.title: JDBC URL Params

oneOf.title: Unencrypted
oneOf.description: The data transfer will not be encrypted.

oneOf.title: Encrypted (trust server certificate)
oneOf.description: Use the certificate provided by the server without verification. (For testing purposes only!)

oneOf.title: Encrypted (verify certificate)
oneOf.description: Verify and use the certificate provided by the server.

trustStoreName.description: Specifies the name of the trust store.
trustStoreName.title: Trust Store Name

trustStorePassword.description: Specifies the password of the trust store.
trustStorePassword.title: Trust Store Password

hostNameInCertificate.description: Specifies the host name of the server. The value of this property must match the subject property of the certificate.
hostNameInCertificate.title: Host Name In Certificate

ssl_method.description: The encryption method which is used to communicate with the database.
ssl_method.title: SSL Method

oneOf.title: Insert Load
oneOf.description: Configuration details for using the INSERT loading mechanism.

oneOf.title: Bulk Load
oneOf.description: Configuration details for using the BULK loading mechanism.

azure_blob_storage_account_name.description: The name of the Azure Blob Storage account. See: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/storage/blobs/storage-blobs-introduction#storage-accounts
azure_blob_storage_account_name.title: Azure Blob Storage Account Name

azure_blob_storage_container_name.description: The name of the Azure Blob Storage container. See: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/storage/blobs/storage-blobs-introduction#containers
azure_blob_storage_container_name.title: Azure Blob Storage Container Name

shared_access_signature.description: A shared access signature (SAS) provides secure delegated access to resources in your storage account. See: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/storage/common/storage-sas-overview
shared_access_signature.title: Shared Access Signature

bulk_load_data_source.description: Specifies the external data source name configured in MSSQL, which references the Azure Blob container. See: https://learn.microsoft.com/sql/t-sql/statements/bulk-insert-transact-sql
bulk_load_data_source.title: BULK Load Data Source

bulk_load_validate_values_pre_load.description: When enabled, Airbyte will validate all values before loading them into the destination table. This provides stronger data integrity guarantees but may significantly impact performance.
bulk_load_validate_values_pre_load.title: Pre-Load Value Validation

load_type.description: Specifies the type of load mechanism (e.g., BULK, INSERT) and its associated configuration.
load_type.title: Load Type
